name: Descend Sprint 2
description:
Your objective is to beat all 4 levels spread throughout the underground.

Keys:
A - Move Left
D - Move Right
S - Fast Fall
Space - Jump
Left Click - Use Drill
E - Use Bomb (Can't break blocks, Can only kill enemies)

Feedback form - https://forms.gle/u3uypPyNcXaLDJap9
